titleStmt.title: The imperfection of most governments taken out of the Epitomy of the Roman history written by Lucius Annæus Florus : where it plainly appears that the liberty of the most flourishing common-wealth of the Romans destroyed written by Roger Trusty.

titleStmt.author: Florus, Lucius Annaeus.
Trusty, Roger.
